ja.title: INTER BEE  IGNITION x DCEXPOに出展いたします
ja.body:
これまで開発，提供してきたテレプレゼンスチャットアプリ３種類を紹介する機会を頂き，[INTER BEE IGNITION x DCEXPOのスタートアップブース](https://www.inter-bee.com/ja/forexhibitors/conference/ignition/)で11月13ー15日まで幕張メッセで展示を行います．

今回は富山県立大学さんとアプリを使った社会参加の取り組みの計画もあわせて紹介させて頂きます．

en.title: Exhibit at INTER BEE IGNITION x DCEXPO
en.body:
We have been given the opportunity to introduce three telepresence chat applications that we had developed, and will exhibit them at the Startup Booth at[ INTER BEE IGNITION x DCEXPO](https://www.inter-bee.com/en/) at Makuhari Messe from November 13 to 15.

In addition to the demo of apps, we will also introduce our plan for social participation using the app with Toyama Prefectural University.
